overview: Luca Damiano is perhaps Italy's greatest erotic filmmaker, though he doesn't seem to get enough credit for his obvious achievements including such classics as "X Hamlet" and "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs". "Jojami" from early in his career is no great shakes, merely part of the bandwagon exploiting the then-novelty of transsexuals having explicit sex on screen.
title: Jojami
